resources.string: Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
The Azerbaijan edition, herein presented was prepared with a view to providing detailed information regarding this country, also known as The Land of Fire.

With more than thousand photos, the book aims at presenting the ancient history, culture, traditions and ethnographic peculiarties of Azerbaijan, as well as the country’s past, present and modern image
Book published as part of the project conducted by the Heydar Aliyev Foundation
